limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: Save At least 20%*. IHGÂ® Rewards Club members save even more with Your Rate. Stay from August 20, 2019 - March 31, 2020. Book By September 24, 2019

limitedTimeFeature.headLine: Big Meetings, Tailor Made
limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: Book a group of 40+ room nights and receive up to 8% off the master bill. Or book 70+ rooms and get 8% off the master bill + 1 signature perk.

limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: Save up to 30% off our best flexible rate + we give $5/night to one of our charity partners, The Trevor Project + No Kid Hungry. Book by Dec. 6.

limitedTimeFeature.headLine: Book Early + Save
limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: Get rewarded when you book at least 7 days in advance. Enjoy up to 20% off our Best Flexible Rate.

limitedTimeFeature.headLine: City Lights
limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: Book at least 3 days in advance and enjoy up to 15% off for a stay from now until April 30, 2020. Must book By February 29, 2020

limitedTimeFeature.headLine: Meet Kimpton, Get Rewarded
limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: When you book a meeting, stay or event by February 1, 2020, You'll earn triple IHG Rewards Club Points.

limitedTimeFeature.headLine: Weekends in Chicago
limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: For a limited time, get 30% off ANY weekend stay. Book 3 days in advance. Friday - Sunday stays (some Thursdays included). 1 night deposit required.

limitedTimeFeature.headLine: Stay + Valet
limitedTimeFeature.shortDescription: Toss us the keys and be on your way. Book this package and receive discounted valet parking (reg. $72/night) included with your stay.

marketingText.hotelMajorFeature: Like a perfectly-fitted, bespoke suit from Savile Row, every detail of The Kimpton Gray Hotel has been thoughtfully considered. Situated in the financial loop in the historical New York Life Insurance Building originally built in 1894. Kimpton Gray takes its name from the Georgia Gray marble thatâs lent the structure a sense of sophistication for well over a century.
marketingText.hotelShortDescription: No detail goes unnoticed at Kimpton Gray Hotel, an opulent cultural oasis in downtown Chicago.
marketingText.welcomeMessage: Think of Kimpton Gray Hotel like a perfectly bespoke suit from Londonâs Savile Row â beautiful, bold, and with no detail out of place. Clad in marble The Gray has been a tastemaker for more than a century, first as an office building and now as an elevated-experience hotel. When the 9-to-5 day is done in the Financial District, those in the know flock to the on-site lounges and restaurants - Vol. 39, a law library-themed bar, Boleo, an Argentinean-inspired lounge with retractable glass roof, and Steadfast, a chef-driven new American restaurant. Consider us for business travel or a weekend getaway. Blocks away from Millennium Park, restaurants and museums.

specialAnnouncementDetails.description: Book with confidence. Our flexible rate options are here for when plans change.

icConcierge.prestayEmailWelcomeMessage: We're as excited about your arrival in Chicago as you are! All the details you need are below, but just email, call, or text if you have any special requests. Don't forget to join us for our hosted wine hour from 5-6pm in the living room.
